articles.title: Imperfect Competition and Rents in Labor and Product Markets: The Case of the Construction Industry
articles.authors: Kory Kroft, Yao Luo, Magne Mogstad, Bradley Setzler
articles.abstract: We develop, identify, and estimate a model of imperfect competition in both labor and product markets. Our context is the US construction industry, where firms compete for workers, private market projects, and government procurements. Our empirical approach leverages bidding data from procurement auctions linked to employer-employee tax records. We find imperfect competition in both markets generates a total wage markdown of more than 30 percent and a total price markup of around 45 percent. By contrast, if one erroneously assumed a perfectly competitive product (labor) market, then one would conclude wages (prices) are marked down (up) by only 20 percent (16 percent).
articles.title_cn: 不完全竞争与劳动和产品市场中的租金：建筑业案例
articles.abstract_cn: 我们开发、识别并估计了一个在劳动和产品市场都不完全竞争的模型。我们的研究背景是美国建筑业，这里的公司为工人、私营市场项目和政府采购展开竞争。我们的实证方法利用了与雇主-雇员税务记录相关的采购拍卖的投标数据。我们发现，两个市场都不完全竞争导致了总工资下降超过30%，总价格上升约45%。相比之下，如果错误地假设产品（劳动）市场是完全竞争的，那么人们会得出工资（价格）仅下降（上升）20%（16%）的结论。

articles.title: Labor Market Power, Self-Employment, and Development
articles.authors: Francesco Amodio, Pamela Medina, Monica Morlacco
articles.abstract: This paper shows that self-employment shapes labor market power in low-income countries, with implications for industrial development. Using Peruvian data, we find that wage-setting power increases with employer concentration but less so where self-employment is more prevalent. A general equilibrium model shows that in oligopsonistic labor markets, self-employment raises the supply elasticity of wage labor, weakening employer market power. However, by the same mechanism, procompetitive policies aimed at expanding wage employment and reducing reliance on self-employment may unintentionally strengthen labor market power, undermining their objectives.
articles.title_cn: 劳动力市场力量、自雇和经济发展
articles.abstract_cn: 本文表明，在低收入国家，自雇塑造了劳动力市场的权力，这对工业发展具有影响。利用秘鲁的数据，我们发现工资设定权力随着雇主集中度的增加而增加，但在自雇更为普遍的地方增加得较少。一个一般均衡模型显示，在寡头垄断的劳动力市场中，自雇提高了工资劳动的供应弹性，削弱了雇主的市场权力。然而，通过同样的机制，旨在扩大工资就业和减少对自雇依赖的竞争政策可能会无意中加强劳动力市场的权力，破坏它们的目标。

articles.title: Nested Bundling
articles.abstract: A nested bundling strategy creates menus in which more expensive bundles include all the goods of less expensive ones. We study when nested bundling is optimal and determine which nested menu is optimal, when consumers differ in one dimension. We define a partial order on bundles by (i) set inclusion and (ii) sales quantity when sold alone. We show that, under quasi-concavity assumptions, if the undominated bundles with respect to this partial order are nested, then nested bundling is optimal. We present an iterative algorithm that identifies the minimal optimal menu consisting of a subset of the undominated bundles.
articles.abstract_cn: 嵌套捆绑策略创建了一种菜单，其中更昂贵的捆绑包含了较便宜捆绑中的所有商品。我们研究了嵌套捆绑何时是最优的，并确定了哪种嵌套菜单是最优的，当消费者在一个维度上有所不同时。我们通过（i）集合包含和（ii）单独销售时的销售量来定义捆绑的偏序。我们展示了，在准凹性假设下，如果相对于这种偏序的未被支配捆绑是嵌套的，那么嵌套捆绑就是最优的。我们提出了一个迭代算法，该算法识别出由未被支配捆绑的子集组成的最小最优菜单。

articles.title: Micro versus Macro Labor Supply Elasticities: The Role of Dynamic Returns to Effort
articles.authors: Henrik Kleven, Claus Kreiner, Kristian Larsen, Jakob Søgaard
articles.abstract: We investigate long-run earnings responses to taxes in the presence of dynamic returns to effort. First, we develop a theoretical model of earnings determination with dynamic returns to effort. In this model, earnings responses are delayed and mediated by job switches. Second, using administrative data from Denmark, we verify our model's predictions about earnings and hours-worked patterns over the life cycle. Third, we provide a quasi-experimental analysis of long-run earnings elasticities. Informed by our model, the empirical strategy exploits variation among job switchers. We find that the long-run elasticity is around 0.5, considerably larger than the short-run elasticity of roughly 0.2.
articles.title_cn: 微观与宏观劳动力供应弹性：努力的动态回报的作用
articles.abstract_cn: 我们研究了在动态努力回报存在的情况下，长期收入对税收的反应。首先，我们建立了一个具有动态努力回报的收入决定理论模型。在这个模型中，收入反应是延迟的，并通过工作转换来调节。其次，我们使用来自丹麦的行政数据，验证了我们模型关于生命周期中收入和工作时间模式的预测。第三，我们提供了对长期收入弹性的准实验分析。根据我们的模型，实证策略利用了工作转换者之间的变化。我们发现长期弹性大约为0.5，明显大于短期弹性的大约0.2。

articles.title: Moonshot: Public R&D and Growth
articles.abstract: We estimate the long-term effect of public R&D on growth in manufacturing by analyzing new data from the Cold War-era space race. We develop a novel empirical strategy that leverages US-Soviet rivalry in space technology to isolate windfall R&D spending. Our results demonstrate that public R&D conducted by NASA contractors increased manufacturing value added, employment, and capital accumulation in space-related sectors. While migration responses were important, they were not sufficient to generate a wedge between local and national effects. The iconic moonshot R&D program had only modest economic effects for both the local and national space-related sectors.
articles.title_cn: 登月计划：公共研发与增长
articles.abstract_cn: 我们通过分析冷战时期太空竞赛的新数据，估计公共研发对制造业增长的长期影响。我们开发了一种新颖的实证策略，利用美苏在空间技术方面的竞争来隔离意外的研发支出。我们的结果表明，由美国国家航空航天局承包商进行的公共研发增加了与太空相关的部门的制造业附加值、就业和资本积累。虽然迁移反应很重要，但它们不足以在地方和国家效应之间产生差异。标志性的登月研发计划对地方和国家太空相关部门的经济影响都是有限的。

articles.title: The Long-Term Effects of Income for At-Risk Infants: Evidence from Supplemental Security Income
articles.authors: Amelia Hawkins, Christopher Hollrah, Sarah Miller, Laura R. Wherry, Gloria Aldana, Mitchell Wong
articles.abstract: The Supplemental Security Income program uses a birth weight cutoff at 1,200 grams to determine eligibility. Using birth certificates linked to administrative records, we find low-income families of infants born just below the cutoff receive higher monthly cash benefits (equal to 27 percent of family income) at ages 0–2 with smaller benefits continuing through age 10. Yet we detect no improvements in health care use and mortality in infancy, nor in health and human capital outcomes as observed through young adulthood for these infants. We also find no improvements for their older siblings.
articles.title_cn: 对处于风险中的婴儿收入的长期影响：来自补充保障收入的证据
articles.abstract_cn: 补充保障收入计划使用1200克的出生体重截止值来确定资格。通过将出生证明与行政记录相联系，我们发现低收入家庭的婴儿出生时体重略低于截止值，在0-2岁时收到更高的月现金福利（相当于家庭收入的27%），较小的福利持续到10岁。然而，我们没有发现这些婴儿在婴儿期的医疗使用和死亡率有所改善，也没有发现这些婴儿在成年早期的健康和人力资本结果有所改善。我们还发现他们的兄弟姐妹也没有改善。

articles.title: Is Air Pollution Regulation Too Lenient? Evidence from US Offset Markets
articles.abstract: We develop a framework to estimate the marginal cost of air pollution regulation and apply it to assess policy efficiency. We exploit a provision of the Clean Air Act that requires new plants to pay incumbent facilities to reduce emissions. This "offset" policy creates hundreds of local pollution markets, differing by pollutant and location. Theory and transaction data suggest that offset prices reveal marginal abatement costs. We compare these prices to marginal benefits of pollution reduction estimated using leading air quality models and find that, on average, marginal benefits exceed marginal costs by more than a factor of ten.
articles.title_cn: 空气污染法规是否过于宽松？来自美国抵消市场的证据
articles.abstract_cn: 我们构建了一个框架来估算空气污染管制的边际成本，并将其应用于评估政策效率。我们利用《清洁空气法》的一项规定，该规定要求新工厂向现有设施支付以减少排放。这种“抵消”政策创造了数百个因污染物和地点不同而异的地方污染市场。理论和交易数据表明，抵消价格揭示了边际减排成本。我们将这些价格与使用领先的空气质量模型估算的污染减少的边际效益进行比较，发现平均而言，边际效益超过边际成本十倍以上。

articles.title: Market-Wide Predictable Price Pressure
articles.authors: Samuel M. Hartzmark, David H. Solomon
articles.abstract: We demonstrate that predictable uninformed cash flows forecast aggregate market stock returns. Buying pressure from dividend payments (announced weeks prior) predicts higher value-weighted market returns, with returns for the top quintile of payment days four times higher than the lowest. This holds internationally and increases when reinvestment is high and market liquidity is low. We estimate a market-level price multiplier of 1.9. These results suggest price pressure is a widespread result of flows, not an anomaly.
articles.title_cn: 全市场可预测的价格压力
articles.abstract_cn: 我们证明了可预测的无知现金流可以预测整体市场股票回报。来自股息支付（几周前宣布）的购买压力预测了更高的价值加权市场回报，支付日顶部五分位数的回报是底部的四倍。这在国际上也成立，并且在再投资高和市场流动性低时增加。我们估计市场层面的价格乘数为1.9。这些结果表明，价格压力是流动资金普遍的结果，而不是异常现象。

articles.title: A Model of Populism as a Conspiracy Theory
articles.abstract: We model populism as the dissemination of a false "alternative reality," according to which the intellectual elite conspires against the populist for purely ideological reasons. If enough voters are receptive to it, this alternative reality—by discrediting the elite's truthful message—reduces political accountability. Elite criticism, because it is more consistent with the alternative reality, strengthens receptive voters' support for the populist. Alternative realities are endogenously conspiratorial to resist evidence better. Populists, to leverage or strengthen beliefs in the alternative reality, enact harmful policies that may disproportionately harm the non-elite. These results explain previously unexplained facts about populism.
articles.title_cn: 作为阴谋论的民粹主义模型
articles.abstract_cn: 我们将民粹主义建模为一个虚假的“替代现实”的传播，根据这种观点，知识精英因纯粹的意识形态原因而与民粹主义者合谋。如果足够多的选民愿意接受这种观点，这种替代现实——通过贬低精英的真实信息——减少了政治问责。精英批评，因为它更符合替代现实，加强了接受选民对民粹主义者的支持。替代现实在内生上是阴谋论的，以更好地抵抗证据。民粹主义者为了利用或加强对替代现实的信仰，实施可能对非精英群体造成不成比例伤害的有害政策。这些结果解释了以前无法解释的关于民粹主义的事实。

articles.title: Test-Optional Admissions
articles.authors: Wouter Dessein, Alex Frankel, Navin Kartik
articles.abstract: Many US colleges now use test-optional admissions. A frequent claim is that by not seeing standardized test scores, a college can admit a student body it prefers, say, with more diversity. But how can observing less information improve decisions? This paper proposes that test-optional policies are a response to social pressure on admission decisions. We model a college that bears disutility when it makes admission decisions that "society" dislikes. Going test optional allows the college to reduce its "disagreement cost." We analyze how missing scores are imputed and the consequences for the college, students, and society.
articles.abstract_cn: 许多美国大学现在采用可选考试的招生政策。一个常见的说法是，如果不看标准化考试成绩，大学可以录取它更偏好的学生群体，比如说，更多元化的学生群体。但是，观察更少的信息如何能改善决策呢？本文提出，可选考试政策是对招生决策社会压力的回应。我们构建了一个模型，模拟一个大学在做出“社会”不喜欢的招生决策时会承受不悦。选择考试可选可以让大学减少其“分歧成本”。我们分析了缺失分数的估算方式以及对大学、学生和社会的后果。

articles.title: Drivers of Change: Employment Responses to the Lifting of the Saudi Female Driving Ban
articles.authors: Chaza Abou Daher, Erica Field, Kendal Swanson, Kate Vyborny
articles.abstract: We conduct a field experiment to quantify the impact of the lifting of the Saudi women's driving ban on women's employment by randomizing rationed spaces in driver's training. Treated women are 41 percent more likely to be employed yet are 19 percent less likely to be able to make purchases without family permission. Patterns of heterogeneous treatment effects reveal that these divergent impacts of access to driving are experienced by distinct subgroups of women. The results underscore the importance of intrahousehold responses that can counteract legal gains in women's freedoms.
articles.title_cn: 变革的驱动因素：对解除沙特女性驾驶禁令的就业响应
articles.abstract_cn: 我们进行了一项实地实验，以量化取消沙特女性驾驶禁令对女性就业的影响，通过随机分配驾驶培训中有限的空间。接受治疗的女性就业的可能性高出41%，但未经家庭许可自行购物的可能性却低19%。异质性治疗效果的模式揭示了这些对女性驾驶权利获得的不同影响是由不同的女性群体所经历的。结果强调了家庭内部反应的重要性，这些反应可能会抵消女性自由的法律收益。
